it.unibo.interfaces

Interface IStation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AirMonitor, GroundMonitor, StationRPI, WaterMonitor

    public interface IStation
    A station is a center of detection of data, has the aim to provide data to the database based on sensors installed on board, which interrogates, and that provide data of different nature: temperature, speed, radiation etc.
    Since:
    05/feb/2015 17:45:44
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    matteo.mariani11@studio.unibo.it
